name: $PROP by Financia Futures
description: PROP is the utility token powering the Financia Futures ecosystem, a proprietary trading firm that offers funded accounts to futures traders through performance-based challenges. The project aims to create a more rewarding and efficient experience for traders by integrating web3 technology into the prop trading model. By holding or staking PROP, traders gain access to platform benefits such as discounted challenge fees, staking rewards, and premium account features. The token also forms the foundation for future governance, referral rewards, and loyalty programs. The overarching goal of the project is to reshape how prop trading platforms engage with tradersâ€”making it more community-driven, transparent, and rewarding through blockchain-based incentives and tools.
